headline: L3Harris Technologies - Space-Based Capabilities Are Critical to Enabling a Missile Shield for America
summary: Ken Bedingfield and Ed Zoiss write in Breaking Defense: To keep our homeland safe, we need a fundamentally new approach to missile defense - one that leverages commercial business models in defense...
